message: Created comprehensive personality_disorders_section.json with 24 questions covering all 10 disorders across 3 clusters. Distribution: Cluster A (6 questions - Paranoid, Schizoid, Schizotypal), Cluster B (8 questions - Antisocial, Borderline, Histrionic, Narcissistic), Cluster C (6 questions - Avoidant, Dependent, OCPD), plus 4 general/comparison questions. All explanations follow ADHD-friendly guidelines: concrete behaviors, observable patterns, WHAT/HOW/WHY structure, celebrity examples (Stalin, Bill Gates, Van Gogh, Ted Bundy, Amy Winehouse, Kanye West, etc.), critical distinctions (OCPD vs OCD, Avoidant vs Schizoid, Borderline vs Histrionic). Content includes rich descriptive material organized by clusters with criticalDistinctions section for tricky exam questions.
